plot: In the heart of modern Athens the only park is the National Garden. That is where the film's protagonists seek refuge. People of every age and origin, workers, occasional visitors, all seek...
title: Ethnikos kipos
plot_es: In the heart of modern Athens the only park is the National Garden. That is where the film's protagonists seek refuge. People of every age and origin, workers, occasional visitors, all seek...
